attires.name: Blangkon
attires.description: A traditional Javanese headdress for men, made from batik fabric. Its shape and pattern can signify social status and origin.

attires.name: Siger
attires.description: A large, ornate, golden crown-like headdress worn by Sundanese brides, symbolizing wisdom and femininity.

attires.name: Iket
attires.description: A traditional Sundanese headcloth for men, tied in various styles. A practical and symbolic accessory.

attires.name: Konde
attires.description: A traditional hair bun, often adorned with jasmine flowers or golden pins. The style varies by region and occasion.
